1 (Inkwells provide {I}.) A deck can have any number of cards named Inkwell.
Theater Mask WQA
B B
0 0 Basic Medium - Mask Medium
1 (You may have Masks enter as a ComedyMask or TragedyMask. Swap them at the start of your turn. ComedyMasks provide {C}. TragedyMasks provide {T}.) A deck can have any number of cards named Theater Mask.
Puppetear WQA
W W
0 0 Creation Creation
1
Transcend Ability: {C}: Puppetear transcends 1. You may trigger the start of turn ability of a ComedyMask. Transcend Ability: CCCCC: Puppetear transcends 2. Attack Ability: {T}: Puppetear attacks 1. You may trigger the start of turn ability of a TragedyMask. Attack Ability: TTTTT: Puppetear attacks 2.
The Ink Stares Back WQA
U U
0 0 Tactic Tactic
1 As a cost to play this card, discard three cards and destroy a creation you control. Search your deck for any number of Inkwell cards, put them into your play zone, then shuffle. They can’t be attached this turn.
Accelerate WQA
U U
0 0 Tactic Tactic
1 Put a Transcendence counter on target creation you control that didn’t enter this turn. It can’t fully transcend from counters put on it this turn. (They still count towards full transcendence later.)
Ruin WQA
U U
0 0 Tactic Tactic
1 Destroy target Medium you don’t control and target Medium you control.
Defensive Stance WQA
U U
0 0 Tactic Tactic
1 Reactive (May be played or activated anytime you have priority.) Put a Transcendence counter on target creation you control that’s being attacked. It can’t fully transcend from counters put on it this turn. (They still count towards full transcendence later.)

W W
0 0 Creation Creation

0 0 Creation Creation

Malore WQA
W W
0 0 Creation Creation
1 Malore requires 1 more Transcendence counters to fully transcend. Whenever a tactic you control resolves, if there are five or more Inkwells attached to Malore, put a Transcendence counter on Malore. At the start of your turn, remove all Transcendence counters from Malore. Transcend Ability: AI: Draw a card.

0 0 Tactic Tactic
